author: Robert Hutton, Kitty Donaldson
title: U.K. Likely to Announce Lockdown Extension This Week, Raab Says - Bloomberg
description: British ministers will decide in the next three days on extending the country’s lockdown, with Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab telling reporters it was likely to carry on and the government’s chief scientific adviser saying he expects the daily rate of deaths …
content:
